hero.title: Ubuhanga bw'Imisoro ku Isi
hero.subtitle: Ikigo cy'ubuhanga mu by'ubucuruzi, gusuzuma, no gufasha cyifite ubwoba ku isi
hero.description: Dutanga ubuyobozi bw'ubuhanga mu by'umusoro n'ubucuruzi buhuye n'abantu bose, ibikoresho, n'ibikorwa. Tunatanga na serivisi zose zihariye mu by'ubucuruzi n'ubwoba.

about.title: Twebwe Turi Bande
about.description: EXCI-MAA ni ikigo cyashinzwe n'abahanga bazi neza mu by'ubucuruzi, gusuzuma, imisoro, iterambere ry'ubucuruzi, sisitemu y'amakuru, uburenganzira, n'ibindi byinshi. Dufite ubuhanga bw'isi mu Canada, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza, na Afurika, dutanga ubuhanga buhagije ku bantu bacu.
about.mission: Intego yacu ni ugufasha abantu bacu bakora ku isoko ry'Afurika kugera ku buhanga bw'ubucuruzi. Dushimishijwe n'ubuhanga bwacu mu byiciro byinshi, byose bikoresha ubucuruzi n'ibindi, dutanga ibisubizo byihariye binyuze mu gufasha, gusuzuma, na serivisi z'ubuyobozi, bihuye n'ibikoresho byose n'ibyiciro.

services.title: Serivisi Zacu
services.subtitle: Ibisubizo by'ubuhanga bihuye n'ibyifuzo by'ubucuruzi bwawe

accounting.title: Ubuhanga mu Bucuruzi
accounting.description: Ikigo cy'ubucuruzi EXCI-MAA cyizwi n'ubuhanga bwo. Gifasha ibikoresho byinshi mu bucuruzi bwabyo bwa buri munsi, harimo gusuzuma, gusuzuma imari, amakuru y'umwaka, gusuzuma ibyifuzo, gufasha mu gutanga amakuru, na gusuzuma.

audit.title: Gusuzuma Uburenganzira, Imisoro na Kontira
audit.description: Dusuzuma ibyifuzo byose by'ubucuruzi, gusuzuma kontira, gusuzuma mu ndi, no gufata ibyago. Gusuzuma imari gushimisha amakuru y'ubucuruzi yizewe n'ihuje.

advice.title: Ubuyobozi ku Banyamabanga
advice.description: Umunyamabanga agomba gufashwa no gufashwa buri munsi, kugira ngo akore neza imisoro ye, ubwoba, n'ubutunzi, kuva mu gutangira ikoresho cye kugeza mu gutanga.

payroll.title: Gutanga Amafaranga n'Ubuyobozi bw'Ubwoba
payroll.description: Dutanga ubufasha buhuye n'ibyifuzo byawe. Amafaranga, imisoro y'ubwoba, umusoro w'ubwoba, kwiga ubwoba, amasezerano y'akazi; dushimishijwe n'abahanga bacu, gufata ubwoba bwanyu byoroshye.

consolidation.title: Gusuzuma
consolidation.description: Dutegura amakuru yacu yose mu nzira z'ubwoba z'isi n'ubwoba. Dukagufasha mu gutangira gusuzuma no gutanga abahanga b'ubwoba.

risk.title: Ubuyobozi mu Byago
risk.description: Dukora ku byifuzo by'ibikoresho by'ubwoba, byinshi byanditswe, mu byiciro by'ubwoba n'ubwoba.

it.title: Ubuyobozi mu Sisitemu y'Amakuru
it.description: Nk'umunyamabanga w'ubucuruzi, ibikoresho byawe by'ubwoba ni by'ingenzi ku bucuruzi bwawe. Dukagufasha guhitamo ibikoresho bihuye n'ubucuruzi bwawe no gutegura ubwoba.

reporting.title: Gutanga Amakuru y'Imari
reporting.description: Dukora ku byifuzo by'ibikoresho by'ubwoba, byinshi byinshi, mu byiciro by'ubwoba n'ubwoba.

training.title: Amahugurwa Yacu
training.subtitle: Porogaramu z'iterambere ry'ubwoba ku bahanga mu bucuruzi n'ubwoba
training.locations: Aho kwiga: Amahugurwa yacu akorwa mu mazu yacu ya Douala na Pointe-Noire, ku matsinda y'abantu barengeje icumi.
training.international: Kwiga ku isi: Dufite ubushobozi bwo gutegura amahugurwa mu mahanga yose duhari.
training.flexibility: Ubwoba bw'isi: Mu bwoba bwawe, tuzasuzuma ubushobozi bwo gutegura amahugurwa mu mahanga wifuza.
training.pricing: Amahitamo y'ubucuruzi: Amafaranga ashobora guhinduka bitewe n'aho amahugurwa atangwa.

footer.description: Dutanga ubuyobozi bw'ubuhanga mu by'umusoro n'ubucuruzi buhuye n'abantu bose, ibikoresho, n'ibikorwa. Tunatanga na serivisi zose zihariye mu by'ubucuruzi n'ubwoba.
